description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4m in depth, maximum height of 3m and eaves height of 3m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension together with the existing garage would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (ja) and  (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The application is considered to be a non- material amendment as it is considered to have an acceptable impact on trees, open space and the parking situation and would not have any significant impacts outside the site.

Please provide existing roof plan at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire property not just part and showing dimensions of proposed work.The submitted existing roof plan is labelled as existing ground floor plan.
